title: Week 2 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 9/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco, R.J. White and Kenny White for the Week 2 edition of 'Best Bets'. And you're going to want to follow these because the guys are coming off a steaming hot Week 1 performance. They hit their parlay and combined to go 14-3 on their best bets. Let's see if that can continue...
Falcons-Cowboys (3:15)
Eagles-Rams (7:25)
Chiefs-Chargers (14:20)
Panthers-Bucs (22:00)
Lions-Packers (28:35)
Giants-Bears (31:50)
Jets-49ers (36:00)
Steelers-Broncos (37:45)
Ravens-Texans (39:30)
Vikings-Colts (41:00)
Bills-Dolphins (46:15)
Jaguars-Titans (47:30)
Cardinals-Washington (50:30)
Patriots-Seahawks (54:00)
Saints-Raiders (59:30)
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @PriscoCBS, @rjwhite1, @KWhiteyVegas
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco, R.J. White and Kenny White for the Week 2 edition of 'Best Bets'. And you're going to want to follow these because the guys are coming off a steaming hot Week 1 performance. They hit their parlay and combined to go 14-3 on their best bets. Let's see if that can continue...
